transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi there, this is James Wilson. I need a refill for my lisinopril, please.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopaedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Uh, no, this is James Wilson. I wanted to request a refill for my lisinopril.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Great! I'm running low, just have about three days left. My pharmacy is CVS on Main Street.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks, James. I'll help with your refill request.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You please tell me your date of birth to verify your identity?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's March 15, 1962.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Could you please spell out your full name for me just to make sure I have the details correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Of course, it's James Wilson, J-A-M-E-S W-I-L-S-O-N.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to use your phone number to look up your record?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: If so, please tell me the number you have on file with us.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: If you're not sure, let me know, and I'll verify your name and date of birth again instead.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I’m sure, that’s the number I’ve used.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. Let me try to look up your record using that number. One moment while I check.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, take your time.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm what I have. Your phone number is eight three one seven zero four

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Uh, no, that’s not right. My number is 555-123-4567.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't proceed further right now, but I will make

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, okay. Just let me know what you need from me.
